item.description:
Our regular monthly dinner and business meeting has been moved a week later than originally planned due to our hostess' illness. We're also changing from potluck to ordering pizza. Please plan on a $5 contribution to pizza. If anyone is willing or able, beverages, appetizers, and desserts would be nice but not required. Please indicate in your RSVP or with a note below if you will be bringing something.

We'll meet at Don and Sharon's home in Hebron. Since it's a private home, you must RSVP for directions!
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
